channel.title: Server Crowns & Client Problem
channel.description:
The first question is:
How can I make it so, everyone sees my 'Owner Crown' ? It works fine for me, but they only see the yellow admin crown.
Same for hidden admins, if I add a special crown for them, no crown is there because the 'Player Rights = 4' Goes before the custom crowns.
I made it so:
[code]if (playerRights == 3) out.write(8); else out.write(playerRights);[/code]
To get my owner crown. But they use the same client and they can only see the yellow admin crown.
Any ideas how to fix it ?
Second question:
I want it so, you can only connect with the current client. Like if I release the new client soon, it says "Your client is not up to date." Or something.
Thanks for your help.

item.title: Server Crowns & Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

noway, i mean u r using the same client, but they arent using the updated client(i mean that u added the owner crown after u uploaded the client) so they got the old client, without the crown, so they see a normal crown,

just add ur clients file to .rar and upload it, and give them the new client download link

Read full topic
